subject: I AM MS.  REBECCA SCHIEBLE,
body:
I AM MS.  REBECCA SCHIEBLE, I WORK WITH THE UNITED STATES TREASURY DEPARTMENT.
REFERENCE TO YOUR ENTITLEMENT FUND AND INLINE WITH THE CHANGE OF
BENEFICIARY'S APPLICATION, SIGNED BY MRS. MARIA COOK WITH YOUR
PURPORTED AUTHORIZATION. THIS ISSUE HAS BEEN CAREFULLY EXAMINED AND WE
HAVE DECLINED MRS. COOK'S APPLICATION AS THE APPLICATION LACKS REGULAR
SIGNATURE. BUT DID YOU EVER INSTRUCT MRS. MARIA COOK TO CLAIM YOUR
FUND WORTH US$7.000.000 MILLION USDOLLARS? BELOW IS THE BANK ACCOUNT INFORMATION PROVIDED BY MRS. MARIA COOK SAYING THAT YOU AUTHORIZED HER TO CLAIM YOUR FUND THAT YOU ARE TERMINALLY ILL.
BANK OF AMERICA
BENEFICIARY: MRS MRS. MARIA COOK
ACCOUNT NUMBER: 586025513245
ROUTING NUMBER: 111000025
BANK ADDRESS: 9711 BISSONNET ST. HOUSTON, TX 77036
IF YOU HAD NOT AUTHORIZED THE CHANGE OF YOUR BANK ACCOUNT IN RESPECT TO
YOUR OUTSTANDING ENTITLEMENT PAYMENT, THEREFORE NOTIFY ME IMMEDIATELY AS
THE NOTIFICATION / DECLARATION WAS SUPPORTED WITH A SWORN AFFIDAVIT FROM
A UK COURT REF: ILK /JJ/202/K2015, DATED 31TH AUGUST,2023 AND SIGNED
BY MRS. MARIA COOK WHO CLAIM AND STATED IN THE SWORN DECLARATION THAT YOU
AUTHORIZED HER TO CLAIM THE SAID FUND ON YOUR BEHALF TO A DIFFERENT BANK
ACCOUNT IN THE U.S.A AS STATED ABOVE BECAUSE YOU WERE TERMINALLY ILL AND
THE DOCTOR WHO IS IN CHARGE OF YOUR CASE STATED THAT YOU WILL NOT STAY
MORE THAN ONE MONTH BEFORE PASSING AWAY.
THIS DEVELOPMENT HAS CAUSED LOTS OF DISCREPANCIES IN YOUR PAYMENT FILE
THAT IS WHY WE HAD TO SUSPEND YOUR PAYMENT AND PROMPTED TO CONTACT YOU
DIRECTLY BEFORE RE-VALIDATING YOUR PAYMENT. YOU CAN BE REST ASSURED THAT I WILL DO EVERYTHING WITHIN MY CAPACITY TO SUCCESSFULLY ACTUALIZE THE QUICK
TRANSFER OF YOUR FUND TO ANY OF YOUR NOMINATED BANK ACCOUNT.
FINALLY, YOU MUST CONTACT HEAD OF PAYMENT DEPARTMENT  AS BELOW:
CONTACT NAME: MRS. JULIA WILLIAM
EMAIL ADDRESS:  
juliawilliam139@gmail.com
KINDLY CONTACT HER  AS SOON AS POSSIBLE SO THAT SHE WILL DIRECT YOU ON
WHAT TO DO. THE ONLY MONEY THAT YOU ARE REQUIRED TO PAY IS $380 US DOLLARS ONLY.
YOURS SINCERELY,
MS.REBECCA SCHIEBLE,
UNITED STATES TREASURY DEPARTMENT.

subject: Re:   I AM MS.  REBECCA SCHIEBLE,
body:
Hello Ms. Rebecca Schieble,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my fund. I appreciate your efforts in examining the issue and bringing it to my attention. However, I must clarify that I have not authorized anyone, including Mrs. Maria Cook, to claim my fund on my behalf.

I find it concerning that someone would make such claims about me being terminally ill and authorizing a change in bank account. Can you provide more information about the sworn affidavit from Mrs. Maria Cook? How did she come to possess this information?

Also, could you please explain why there is a need for me to contact the head of the payment department? What specific actions do they require from me?

Thank you for your assistance in resolving this matter.

Best wishes,
Oscar

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Dear Beneficiary,
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your email. Thank you for letting us
know that you never send MRS. MARIA COOK to neither represent you nor claim
your compensation awarded to you by the United Nations through the approved
bank in the United States, Bank of America.

I have forwarded your message to the security and intelligence department
to inform the FBI and Police to have this woman by name Mrs. Maria Cook
arrested as quickly as possible. However, now that you are aware of your
fund valued $US7 million us dollars. We have verified your personal
information again to make sure that we are dealing with the rightful
beneficiary. As a matter of importance, you will fill the attached form and
return it back to me and we will verify your given information with our
records then we will proceed forward to your payment. We will start
processing your claim and your fund will be approved for payment to your
designed bank account if you submitted the form as attached in this message
back to me. There are some classified clearance documents that will be
issued in your name to back up the fund transfer to your bank account and
you will be required to present those documents to your bank at their
request when the sum of US$7 million is deposited in it. Therefore, once
the approval letter to transfer your fund is ready, I will forward a copy
of your fund approval certificate authorizing the payment bank to pay the
above sum of money into your bank account. But you are required to pay the
sum of US$580 to have our attorney secure these documents in your name to
protect your funds when in your bank account and from the Government,
including your bank officials.

Furthermore, once we receive the filled-out form from you, the approval
certificate of your fund in your name, then you will send through this sum
of US$580 only. This required sum of money will cover the cost of logistics
securing these documents from the United States Justice department within
48 hours by a reputable attorney working for the United States Treasury
Department.

Finally, I look forward to receiving the filled-out form with the required
information.


Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Julia William
Foreign Payment Manager
US Treasury Department
Telephone: +1-901-338-6191.

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Hello,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's important to be cautious when dealing with financial matters. Can you provide more details about the process of verifying my personal information and the steps involved in receiving the fund? I want to make sure everything is clear before proceeding.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Oscar

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Dear Sir,

I received your email message and I must inform you that you have to
provide first your full name, mailing address and your telephone to cross
check our records to make sure that we are dealing with the legitimate
beneficiary before sending to you some classified documents covering your
payment. This is for security reasons. I wait to hear from you soon with
the needful information that you need.
Best Regards,
Mrs. Julia William
US Treasury Department.

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Hello Mrs. Julia William,
Thank you for reaching out. I understand the need for security measures. Could you please provide more details about the classified documents covering the payment? I would like to know more about what is involved before proceeding further. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Oscar

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Dear Sir,

The classified documents are the fund clearance documents that will be
secured in your favor by our attorney from the United States Justice
department. These documents will be issued in your name to obtain an
approval to pay to your bank account this compensation sum of $7 million
dollars. However, what is required from you is $580 only to secure this
documents from the Justice department of the United States.  Once this
document is ready in your name, the paying bank will be authorize to pay to
your bank account details your compensation sum of $7 million dollars.
Furthermore, these documents will be presented to your bank to clear the
fund when it arrives into your bank account.  Therefore, like I said
yesterday that you should send to me your full name, address and telephone
number to proceed if you want to receive your payment. I look forward to
seeing your response soon.

Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Julia William
US Treasury department.

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Hello! Thank you for sharing this information with me. Can you please provide more details about the process of securing these documents from the United States Justice Department? How long does it usually take to complete this process?

Best wishes,

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Dear Sir,

It takes within 48 hours to secure these documents by the attorney and same
day, the compensation amount of money will be transfer to your local or
international bank account.

Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Julia William
US Treasury Department.

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Our attorney will secure the approval and clearance documents from the US
Justice department upon the payment fee of $580, these both documents will
be issued in your name and then the attorney will send scan copies of these
documents to you and thereafter the paying bank will transfer into your
bank account with the $7 million dollars.

Yours Sincerely,
Mrs. Julia William
US Treasury Department.

subject: Re: Your Compensation reward
body:
Dear Sir,

Please note that this is my last email message to you regarding the
compensation payment in your favor. As a matter of importance, you have to
provide your full name, home address and telephone number to check up with
our database and confirm from therein that you are the original and
legitimate beneficiary, to avoid giving out information to a wrong person
but if you still insist not to send me this required information for our
verification then I will understand that you are not the real beneficiary
of this sum of money.

I wait to hear from you soon.

Mrs. Julia William.
